questions.question: 1. Which of the following is the best description of a substring?

answers.a: Any combination of a subset of characters from a string in the same order as the string.
answers.b: Contiguous sequence of characters within a string in the same order.
answers.c: Any possible combination of the original set of characters present in the string.

explanations.a: A Subsequence is the subset of characters from a string in the same order as the string.
explanations.b: A Substring is a contiguous sequence of characters within a string in the same order.
explanations.c: A Subset is a possible combination of the original set of characters present in the string.

questions.question: 2. Which of the following is not a prefix of the string “algorithm” ?

explanations.a: It is a substring with initial index 0 and final index as 3.
explanations.b: It is a substring with initial index 0 and final index as 8 (A complete string is also a prefix of a string with final index  = size of string -1).
explanations.c: A prefix of string is a substring where the starting index is 0. It is substring with initial index 2 and final index 3.Intial index!=0, so not a prefix string.
explanations.d: It is substring with initial index 0 and final index 1.

questions.question: Which of the following is a suffix of the string “vlabs” ?

explanations.a: It is a substring with initial index 0 and final index as 3.
explanations.b: It is a substring with initial index 1 and final index as 3
explanations.c:
It is substring with initial index 1 and final index 4.
Final index== 4(n-1) , so it is a suffix of string “vlabs”.
